title: Strengthening E-Learning Practical Competencies: Experiential Training for Global Business Practices and Intercultural Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: They can observe business practices in multicultural corporate settings and articulate at least three key differences.
Through collaboration with local industry experts, learners can devise intercultural communication strategies and create actionable plans.
Post-experiential learning, reflective journaling enables learners to derive at least five personal growth insights and apply them to future career paths.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
